name: Solrock
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: A new Pokémon species, rumored to be from the sun. It gives off light while spinning.

poke_body.name: Sunlight
poke_body.effect: If you have Lunatone in play, damage done to your opponent’s Pokémon by your {P} or {F} Pokémon isn’t affected by resistance.

attacks.name: Sol Charge
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
